channel.title: Motion Ink: Tattoo Artists & Artwork (Enhanced)
channel.description: Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry. Enhanced AAC for iTunes and iPod.
channel.itunes:author: Motion Ink
channel.itunes:subtitle: Motion Ink: Enhanced Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry. The Motion Ink guys talk about the next DVD, the tattoo industry, the amazing artists and their artwork, and whatever else seems interesting.
channel.itunes:keywords: tattoo, tattoos, motionink, motion, ink, dvd, magazine

item.title: Motion Ink: Podcast #001
item.description: Rich & Will discuss the original idea, themselves, and the first three shops. Release date is August 2, 2006. Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.
item.itunes:author: Motion Ink
item.itunes:subtitle: Motion Ink: Podcast #001
item.itunes:summary: Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.

item.title: Motion Ink: Podcast #002
item.description: Rich & Will talk a little about moving artwork and skill. Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.
item.itunes:author: Motion Ink
item.itunes:subtitle: Motion Ink: Podcast #002
item.itunes:summary: Rich & Will talk a little about moving artwork and skill. Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.

item.title: Motion Ink: Podcast #003
item.description: Will & Rich discuss the challenge of capturing so many great pieces of art and trying to edit them down into the DVD format, with stills, movies, music and narration. Then they cover getting to the theme of every shop, from old-school tattooing to oil painting, monster tattoos, and getting your group tattoo. Finally they talk about some bands joining the project with featured music. Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.
item.itunes:author: Motion Ink
item.itunes:subtitle: Motion Ink: Podcast #003
item.itunes:summary: Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.

item.title: Motion Ink: Podcast #004
item.description: Will & Rich discuss how they work together to collect the artwork from the different shops. They also talk about who helped point them in the direction of concentrating on the artwork and artists. Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.
item.itunes:author: Motion Ink
item.itunes:subtitle: Will & Rich discuss how they work together to collect the artwork from the different shops. They also talk about who helped point them in the direction of concentrating on the artwork and artists.
item.itunes:summary: Will & Rich discuss how they work together to collect the artwork from the different shops. They also talk about who helped point them in the direction of concentrating on the artwork and artists. Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.

item.title: Motion Ink: Podcast #005
item.description: After a two week break to concentrate on the core project development, Will & Rich get back behind the microphone to bring us up to speed with their progress. We talk about duplication, software, hardware, and why Motion Ink is unlike anything else out there. Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.
item.itunes:author: Motion Ink
item.itunes:subtitle: After a two week break to concentrate on the core project development, Will & Rich get back behind the microphone to bring us up to speed with their progress. Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.
item.itunes:summary: Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.

item.title: Motion Ink: Podcast #006
item.description: Rich and Will are finishing up the DVD. After duplication it's time to start distribution! We talk about Tommy Lee, Dane Cook, and Rob Zombie, plus the upcoming Boston Tattoo Convention and Body Language Tattoo at UCONN. Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.
item.itunes:author: Motion Ink
item.itunes:subtitle: Rich and Will are finishing up the DVD. We talk about Tommy Lee, Dane Cook, and Rob Zombie, plus the upcoming Boston Tattoo Convention and Body Language Tattoo. Motion Ink is a quarterly DVD magazine showcasing artists and artwork in the tattoo industry.
